name: Restauranttheme
body:
HOME
HOME
~~TASTE~~
RICH FLAVORED CULTURAL FOOD!

LOCATION AND CONTACT
74-06 37 ROAD
JACKSON HEIGHTS, NY 11372
PHONE: 929 522 0625



 

ABOUT
THE TASTE OF NEPAL
imgres

With the desire to make more people known to nepali foods and nepali culture we have opened this new restaurant, Nepali Bancha Ghar. Here you can experience the flavor of rich Nepali cultural foods. If you want to try new foods this is the place to come for a great nepali cuisine.

MENU
 

(THALI)

Chicken Thali  $8.00

Goat Thali        $9.00

 Sukuti Thali     $11.00

Fish Thali         $10.00

Pork Thali        $10.00

Dhedo Thali     $11.00

Vegetable Thali $7.00

Chicken Briyani    small =$6.00   large= $10.00

Chicken Thali with Palak Paneer $12.00
